original_title: UFC Fight Night 113: Nelson vs. Ponzinibbio
overview: UFC Fight Night 113: Nelson vs. Ponzinibbio was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship held on July 16, 2017 at The SSE Hydro in Glasgow, Scotland. A welterweight bout between Gunnar Nelson and Santiago Ponzinibbio headlined the event.
title: UFC Fight Night 113: Nelson vs. Ponzinibbio
